# Agent Artifacts — llms.txt
# Machine-readable product index for LLM agents and crawlers
# Site: https://agentassets.io
# Updated: 2026-02-25

## About
Agent Artifacts is a digital download store selling production-ready AI prompts, skill modules, agents, utilities, and documentation.
All products are delivered as Markdown and JSON files with instant digital delivery after Stripe checkout.

## Products
- [Ideation Prompt Pack](https://agentassets.io/products/prompt-ideation-base) — PROMPT — Now $19 — Fast ideation prompts for agent tasks
- [System Chain Prompt Suite](https://agentassets.io/products/prompt-system-chain) — PROMPT — Now $29 — Multi-role chain prompts for workflows

## Categories
- prompt: Ready-to-use prompt packs and chains
- skill: Skill modules with schemas and error handling
- agent: Full packaged agents with configs and docs
- utility: JSON schemas, guardrails, and templates
- doc: Playbooks, cookbooks, and compatibility guides
- bundle: Curated product bundles at discounted prices

## Licensing
All products are licensed for commercial single-seat use. Redistribution and resale of raw files is not permitted.
